sentences.sContent: The newspaper which libelled him had already offered compensation.
sentences.sCn: 那家诽谤他的报纸已经提出赔偿。

synos.tran: 诽谤罪；诋毁；毁坏名誉的东西；控诉书

remMethod.val: lib(文字) + el → (文字)诽谤； 注意不要和label(n. 标签)相混

words.tran: 诽谤的；损害名誉的（等于libelous）

trans.tranOther: to write or print a libel against someone
when someone writes or prints untrue statements about someone so that other people could have a bad opinion of them
